title: Scouting and Guiding in Azerbaijan
text:
The <a href="Scouting">Scout</a> and <a href="Girl%20Guides">Guide</a> movement in <a href="Azerbaijan">Azerbaijan</a> is served by the <a href="Association%20of%20Scouts%20of%20Azerbaijan">Association of Scouts of Azerbaijan</a>, member of the <a href="World%20Organization%20of%20the%20Scout%20Movement">World Organization of the Scout Movement</a> and the <a href="World%20Association%20of%20Girl%20Guides%20and%20Girl%20Scouts">World Association of Girl Guides and Girl Scouts</a>. The <a href="Association%20of%20Azerbaijan%20Girl%20Guides">Association of Azerbaijan Girl Guides</a>, formerly "working towards <a href="World%20Association%20of%20Girl%20Guides%20and%20Girl%20Scouts">WAGGGS</a> membership, is no longer active.
International Scouting units in Azerbaijan.
In addition, there are <a href="Girl%20Scouts%20of%20the%20USA">Girl Scouts of the USA</a> Overseas in Baku, serviced by way of USAGSO headquarters in <a href="New%20York%20City">New York City</a>; as well as Cub Scout Pack 777 in Baku, linked to the <a href="Direct%20Service">Direct Service</a> branch of the <a href="Boy%20Scouts%20of%20America">Boy Scouts of America</a>, which supports units around the world.
